You've learned how to synchronize traditional martial arts and guns. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Bullet Dancer Stance]{Bullet Dancer Stance} action. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you gain that new proficiency with bayonets, reinforced stocks, simple firearms and unarmed attacks.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.5nd8ON2kFGOsCdwQ]{Bullet Dancer} dedication archetype.

value.value: expert in unarmored defense and trained in simple weapons
